laboratory_examinations.findings: 201 U/ml (normal range, /H1102160 U/ml). Initial finding was negative.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Elevated to 150 U/ml three years after the initial diagnosis of mild thyroid failure, while the mother showed a gradual increase in anti-TPO antibodies.

laboratory_examinations.findings: TSH: 14.8 mU/liter (normal range, 0.3–4.5 mU/liter), Free T4: 6.4 pmol/liter (normal range, 8–26 pmol/liter)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially euthyroid in early adulthood, later diagnosed with mild autoimmune hypothyroidism at age 31 years.
